name: FORUMBrussels International
membership: Info may be received upon inquiries.
goal:
The Forum Brussels Internationl is an International Communications Forum for People in Leadership. It endeavours to promote Christian values, to discuss, conceptualise and promote democratic concepts, the growing role of the EU in the world, Islam, Buddhism and other religions in EU States, bridging the gap between the EU and its citizens, receiving delegations and groups of students and others to introduce to the workings of the EU institutions; thereby bringing people together from the whole world, incl. the dimplomatic, political and NATO sectors. The Forum is independent and not part of any political party, movement or the church.
Aside from representing religion and discussing issues on the basis of Christian worldview, the Forum is in itself a Think Tank operating as an NGO.
interests: Culture, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: Das Forum gibt Acht auf die EU-Politik bzgl. der Religionsfreiheit, Kirche und Staat, Entwicklungszusammenarbeit, Menschenrechten und Demokratieförderung,  Außen- und Sicherheitspolitik, Bildung und Kultur, Soziales und Jugend so wie  Verbraucherschutz und Unternehmen.
